attributes.action: Requisition private hospital bed at cost price for use during the Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The Spanish government have already implemented this, the UK should too.
attributes.background: Call on the government to make it mandatory for private hospitals to give over unused hospital beds and resources without charging to gain a profit (offering the bed at cost price). Private hospitals should be helping during this crisis not seeking profits out of such dark times.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302610

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
